subject: note that you have been 30 day
body: note that you have been 30 days starting from today the 2nd of March 2024 to respond.

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the information you have to share. Can you please provide me with some details?

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello
How are you doing today? We have two propositions for you. 1, If you
personally want a loan for your project and 2, If you want to also act as
our representative on behalf of people you might know who also need loans.
If you are interested, we could work with you as our representative and
will offer you 5% on any applicant which you will provide for a loan
facility. You will look for potential applicants for any loan facility
ranging from One Million to Five Hundred Million United States Dollars or
should you need a loan yourself. We will then give you 5% on the return on
investment on any of such facilities provided.

Value of funds: ONE MILLION USD to FIVE HUNDRED MILLION USD (INDIVIDUAL
APPLICATIONS)
                ONE MILLION USD TO THREE BILLION USD (REGISTERED BUSINESSES
AND INSTITUTIONS)
Placement opens to: INDIVIDUALS/ COMPANIES
Purpose of Funds: LONG TERM INVESTMENT (at least) fixed 3% ROI/PA (first 18
months moratorium on loan)
Fund Disbursement: ASAP

We will give you a commission agreement to this effect and it shall be
binding. Each applicant will be required to meet with our financial team
for a live meeting during which you will sign the funds release documents
and thereafter, the funds will be wired directly into a nominated bank
account of your choice. Kindly find attached our know your client (KYC)
form which you or any applicant which you might have, should fill carefully
and return back to us for consideration.
Regards,
Peter Wilson
Managing Director/Portfolio Manager
Al Rigga Investments LLC
Office No. 305 3rd Floor Retaj Building,
Al Waab Street Al Sadd
P.O Box 22670
Doha, Qatar
Tel: +974 8831 6224
Intl Phone: +1(252)777-0774

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Peter Wilson,

Thank you for reaching out with this opportunity. I'm interested in learning more about the loan facilities you mentioned. Could you provide more details on the terms and conditions, as well as the types of projects or individuals that would be eligible for these loans?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Jeanne,
Thanks for your response and interest. As regards your questions and
inquiry, we must inform you that Al Rigga Investment LLC Direct Investment
has one of the most experienced investment management teams in the region.
As a result of our deep and long standing, our team has extensive knowledge
and experience in both sourcing and managing a portfolio of companies. In
other words, funding for the project will be injected in cash, held by our
Investors' banks.

We are working hard to apply the highest institutional investing standards,
delivered by a committed and highly skilled team of specialists, who share
the same set of principles and are passionate about forming long-term
relationships with our stakeholders. Our main goals are to take full
advantage of every business opportunity that is given to us and to
establish cooperative relationships with globally minded businesses and
businesspeople. By employing our knowledge, experience, and extensive
network, we collaborate with our partners to develop long-term commercial
connections. In order to position ourselves for global development, we
regularly evaluate both inbound and outbound investment projects, investing
funds in companies and other entities that aim to provide both a measurable
social benefit and a financial return.

Business and startup ideas to a wide range of professional parties, such as
the oil and energy sectors, the mining and metals sector, the hospital and
health care sector, information technology, intermediaries in banks and
investments, the agricultural sector, financial planners, the consumer
service sector, the international trade and development sector, the
gambling and casinos sector, financial advisors, wealth managers,
pharmaceuticals, the management consulting sector, and the electrical and
electronic manufacturing sector Al Rigga Investment LLC also provides
personal loans, commercial loans, and home loans; unsecured capital loans
and secured working capital loans.

We thus appeal to you to kindly use your network/associates to help us
identify potential individuals/companies that might need any amount.
Operating correspondent loans with Al Rigga Investment LLC as alternative
lenders.  Kindly engage me with your project(s) brief, for a more detailed
discussion on this proposal. Kindly fill out our know your client (KYC)
form which we have attached to enable us start the process of consideration
of your application. Kindly note that we will ONLY provide you with the
loan but will not be involved in your business.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Peter,
Thank you for reaching out and providing detailed information about Al Rigga Investment LLC Direct Investment. It's interesting to learn about your investment management team and the various sectors you are involved in. Can you tell me more about the specific criteria or requirements for companies seeking funding from Al Rigga Investment LLC? How do you assess the potential of a company before providing them with a loan? Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Jeanne,
Thanks for your emails and sorry about my rather late response. Our terms
and conditions are that a registered business name will be able to attract
bigger loan amounts as we will guide and assist these companies or
registered business names to succeed in their businesses as that will also
favour our firm.
Individual loans will be restricted to certain amounts.
We await to receive from you, filled KYC forms to enable us start the
processing.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:

Could you provide more details on how you guide and assist these companies to succeed in their businesses? Also, what are the restrictions on individual loan amounts?
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeanne

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Jeanne,
Thanks for your email. Registered  business names or companies will be able
to attract loans up to Three Billion United States Dollars while
Individuals loans will not exceed five hundred million dollars. We await
the filled KYC forms which provides us the details needed to start the
process of loan application.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Jeanne,
Thanks for your prompt response. Once we receive our know your client (KYC)
form, we will then have enough information about the client which we will
then process through our own methods. We then check out the registration
details once it checks out, we process the information in 3 days before we
schedule an in-person meeting where the release documents are signed and
the funds credited into the client's provided account.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.

subject: Re: note that you have been 30 day
body:
Hello Jeanne,
Thanks for your mail. The KYC form should simply be printed and the
prospective applicant then fills it out, scans and sends it back to us for
the loan processing.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.

Thanks for your mail once again. The Know Your Client (KYC) form is mainly
for us to know about our potential client. With the information from the
form, we will then know how to proceed.
Regards,
Peter Wilson.
